summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the drainage and wastewater system of The City of Seattle; authorizing the issuance and sale of drainage and wastewater system revenue bonds, in one or more series, for the purpose of paying all or part of the costs of refunding certain of the City's drainage and wastewater system revenue bonds and issuing and selling the bonds; providing for terms, covenants and manner of sale of the bonds; describing the lien of the bonds; and providing for agreements and activities in connection with the disposition of the proceeds of the bonds.
